name: vega-crossfilter

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-crossfilter.js -c -m -o build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-crossfilter.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-crossfilter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-crossfilter.js build/vega-crossfilter.min.js

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-crossfilter.js -c -m -o build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-crossfilter.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-crossfilter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-crossfilter.js build/vega-crossfilter.min.js

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-crossfilter.js -c -m -o build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-crossfilter.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-crossfilter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-crossfilter.js build/vega-crossfilter.min.js

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-crossfilter.js -c -m -o build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-crossfilter.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-crossfilter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-crossfilter.js build/vega-crossfilter.min.js

readme:
# vega-crossfilter

Indexed cross-filtering for Vega dataflows.

This module provides the following Vega data transforms:

- [**CrossFilter**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/crossfilter/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-crossfilter/blob/master/src/CrossFilter.js "Source")
- [**ResolveFilter**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/resolvefilter/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-crossfilter/blob/master/src/ResolveFilter.js "Source")
